text.name: Cavernous Wailing
coinDescs: [EndSkill] Apply 10% of this unit's max HP as Shield to self and 1 other ally with the least current HP, and apply 2 [ShieldManagerCryingToad] as well
- At 4+ highest Reson., apply it to 1 more ally
- If the affected unit already has [ShieldManagerCryingToad], change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 2
- At 4+ highest Gloom A-Reson., this Skill's above effects change to 'apply 3 [ShieldManagerCryingToad]' and 'change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 3' instead.

text.name: Cavernous Wailing
coinDescs:
[EndSkill] Apply <style="highlight">14% of this unit's max HP as Shield to self and <style="highlight">(1 + (highest Reson. - 2)) allies with the least current HP, and apply 2 [ShieldManagerCryingToad] as well
<style="highlight">(max # of other allies that gain [ShieldManagerCryingToad]: 3)
- If the affected unit already has [ShieldManagerCryingToad], change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 2<style="highlight">
- At 4+ highest Gloom A-Reson., this Skill's above effects change to 'apply 3 [ShieldManagerCryingToad]' and 'change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 3' instead.<style="highlight">

passiveList.name: Tear Film
passiveList.desc:
Turn Start: If this unit has Shield, gain 1 [Protection]
If this unit is under [ShieldManagerCryingToad]'s effect, gain 1 additional [Protection]

text.name: Cavernous Wailing
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets Randomly
[BeforeAttack] At 4+ highest Reson., Atk Weight +1
[BeforeAttack] Gain +5 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 [[Sinking]]
[EndSkill] Gain (15 + 2.5(highest Reson.))% of this unit's max HP as Shield to self and gain 2 [ShieldManagerCryingToad]. (max 25%)
- If this unit already has [ShieldManagerCryingToad], change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 2
- At 4+ highest Gloom A-Reson., this Skill's above effects change to 'gain 3 [ShieldManagerCryingToad]' and 'change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 3' instead.
